DOC.brief_summary: To assess implant stability , implant loss , adverse skin reaction , Quality Life Benefit follow implantation Ponto 4.5mm Wide Diameter implant . Secondary : determine feasibility fit sound processor 3 week surgical implantation , investigate type skin reaction follow implantation could relate demographic data subject type surgical technique use
DOC.brief_title: Wide Diameter Bone Anchored Implant Study
DOC.criteria: conductive , mixed single side deafness 18 year age old young 18 year age
